      • loadModel

        public Model loadModel(float[] vertices,
                       float[] texCoords,
                       float[] normals,
                       int[] indices,
                       int[] vertexCounts)
        Load a model with multiple levels of detail
        Parameters:
        vertices - The vertices
        texCoords - The texture coordinates
        normals - The normals
        indices - The indices
        vertexCounts - The number of vertices in each level of detail
        Returns:
        The model that was created

      • loadModel

        public Model loadModel(VertexBuffer vertexVBO,
                       VertexBuffer texCoordVBO,
                       VertexBuffer normalVBO,
                       IndexBuffer ibo,
                       int length,
                       float radius)
        Load a model from vertex buffers
        Parameters:
        vertexVBO - The vertex buffer
        texCoordVBO - The texture coordinate buffer
        normalVBO - The normal buffer
        ibo - The index buffer
        length - The number of indices in the index buffer
        radius - The distance from the farthest point to the origin of the model
        Returns:
        The model that was created

      • loadModel

        public Model loadModel(float[] vertices,
                       float[] texCoords,
                       float[] normals,
                       int[] indices)
        Load a model with a single level of detail
        Parameters:
        vertices - The vertices
        texCoords - The texture coordinates
        normals - The normals
        indices - The indices
        Returns:
        The model that was created

      • loadModel

        public Model loadModel(java.lang.String name)
        Load a model from a file
        Parameters:
        name - The file to be loaded from in the folder res/models
        • If there is no extension or the extension is .nlm the model is loaded using the NLM Model Format
        • If the extension is .obj the model is loaded using the OBJ model format
        Returns:
        The model that was loaded

      • loadTexture

        public Texture2D loadTexture(java.lang.String file)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Load a PNG texture
        Parameters:
        file - The file without the .png extension in res/textures to load
        Returns:
        The texture that was laoded
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the texture failed to load

      • loadTexture

        public Texture2D loadTexture(java.lang.String file,
                             boolean forceUnique)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Load a PNG texture
        Parameters:
        file - The name of the file without the .png extension in res/textures to load
        forceUnique - If true make sure the texture isn't just a new reference to a cached texture
        Returns:
        The texture that was loaded
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the texture failed to load

      • loadFont

        public Font loadFont(java.lang.String name,
                     int padding)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Load a font
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file without the .fnt extension in res/fonts to load
        padding - The amount of padding around each character
        Returns:
        The font that was loaded
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the font failed to load

        public void preContextChange()
        Called before an OpenGL context change, destroys any vertex arrays and framebuffers

      • postContextChange

        public void postContextChange()
        Called after an OpenGL context change, recreates any vertex arrays and framebuffers that were destroyed

      • generateHeightMap

        public HeightMap generateHeightMap(java.lang.String name,
                                   float maxHeight)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Load a height map from a texture
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file without the .png extension in res/textures to load
        maxHeight - The height of a full white color
        Returns:
        The height map that was created
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the height map failed to load
